```{r}
library(reticulate)
reticulate::py_discover_config()
use_python("/jhpce/shared/jhpce/core/conda/miniconda3-4.6.14/envs/svnR-devel/bin/python3")
```

```{r}
scipy <- import("scipy")
scipy$amin(c(1,3,5,7))
```



# Calling the python repl

Not executed, you can call the python repl from the R command. Use `exit` to exit the repl.

```
repl_python()
```

Objects do not have permenancy in R after exiting the python repl.
